import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import onboardingImage from '../assets/onboarding-image.jpg'; export default function Onboarding() { const [step, setStep] = useState(1); const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ education: '', field: '', skills: '', resume: null, goal: '', }); const navigate = useNavigate(); const handleNext = () => { if (step < 7) setStep(step + 1); else navigate('/recommended-jobs'); }; const handleBack = () => { if (step > 1) setStep(step - 1); }; return (

)} {step === 2 && (

What’s Your First Step Toward Success?

Whether you’re job hunting, practicing interviews, or polishing your resume we’ll guide you every step.

{['Find My First Job', 'Practice Interviews', 'Build My Resume'].map((goal) => ( ))}
)} {step === 3 && (

Help Us Know You Better.

A few quick details so we can show you the most relevant jobs and best practice interviews.

{/* Skills */}
{/* Resume Upload */}
setFormData({ ...formData, resume: e.target.files[0] })} className="w-full border border-dashed border-purple-400 rounded px-4 py-6 text-center cursor-pointer bg-gray-50" />

)}
); }
